attributes.action: demand a public apology from AQA regarding A-level unit 4 Biology Exam (25/1/2010)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The AQA biology paper taken across the UK on 25/1/2010 was indeed an unfair exam, and therefore we demand a public apology from AQA.

See the Facebook Group for more details:

http://www.facebook.com/group.php?v=wall&gid=453647705494

http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=303858805099&ref=mf
